::Battera::

She smiled at CyberShark and took his hand in hers.  She smiled and 
gently squeezed his hand. "Please, let's see what he want's first.  
Perhaps he wants to help."  She turned to Grimmler,"Please, tell me.  
Why are you here? Do you want to join us?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He didn't like this Grimmler fellow. CyberShark didn't need a 
gun, he let his fin/blade hand spin a few times, just to let Grimmler 
know what he could do.
>     Giving Grimmler an sarcastic look he said, "Actually, I'm a 
Destron."
> 
> ::Destron Base/Magmatron (Special one time appearance)::
> 
>     The Destron base received a surge of information from the 
Gateway. In it was a program that Magmatron could use to talk in 
life, for one time only. He decided to watch for a while.
>     "Shredder, please bring me in Blondetron," Magmatron said 
watching.
